I'm assigning this one to you Nicholas since George (which I CCed) is not available all the time. Feel free to delegate it within your team :)

I had a deep investigation and found that this method is not yet called from any of our plug-ins. Sorry for the example in the last comment (it calls the same method in BDIIStore). But anyway I have added an if control to grant that no error occurs if a null parameter is delivered to the AddListener in RGMAStore. And also, the AddStatusListener must be first called. 

So I have fixed this item.
since I have not got any comments I close this bug.
